alert.note: Alert for Allen; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 10:56AM CDT until March 28 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Calcasieu River Near Kinder Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Kinder. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding of wooded areas near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 16.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM CDT Saturday was 16.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 16.2 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Calcasieu River Kinder 16.0 16.2 Sat 10 am CD 16.0 15.4 14.3 &&
